summary: Tested same-material bug fix implementation. Backend working correctly, frontend has integration issues with material selection and UI updates not reflecting same-material detection properly.

integration_issues.issue: Amber warning banner not appearing when both materials are MA2-1
Dropdown selections not persisting correctly - shows VT1-0 even after selecting MA2-1
Chart caption still shows different materials (MA2-1/VT1-0) instead of same-material status

ui_bugs.issue: Correctly hides intermetallic layers and shows 'no intermetallics' text

passed_tests: Backend: Same-material returns notes with same_material warning
Backend: Same-material has NO intermetallic zone
Backend: Same-material stress is flat (all values equal)
Backend: Same-material all 5 models give equal UTS
Frontend: Sandwich Visual correctly suppresses intermetallics for same material
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix frontend same-material detection integration: 1) Material dropdown selections not persisting when changed to same material, 2) Amber warning banner (calculation notes) not appearing for same-material combinations, 3) Stress chart caption not reflecting same-material status. Backend implementation is correct.
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (9/9 tests passed), Frontend: 20% (critical same-material UI detection failing)
